features: CETAPHIL DAILY FACIAL MOISTURIZER SPF 15: Three-in-one facial moisturizer hydrates, nourishes and protects sensitive skin
DAILY SPF PROTECTION: Broad spectrum SPF 15 protects against damaging UVA and UVB rays
LONG LASTING HYDRATION: restores and improves your skin's ability to retain vital moisture
FAST ABSORBING, LIGHTWEIGHT FORMULA: non-greasy, paraben free formula with no added fragrance won't clog pores
DESIGNED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating
body.description: Product Description CETAPHIL Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 15 is a lightweight and fast absorbing moisturizer designed to hydrate, nourish and protect dry to normal skin types. Broad spectrum SPF 15 protects against the sun's damaging UVA and UVB rays to keep skin looking youthful. A special formulation of glycerin and emollients moisturizes the skin and helps to keep it hydrated by improving your skins natural ability to retain moisture. The lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, providing instant and long lasting hydration without clogging pores. Paraben free with no added fragrance, this gentle yet effective face lotion with sunscreen is clinically tested for even the most sensitive skin. From the Manufacturer .

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cetaphil Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF15 Benefits Retain Vital Moisture without Clogging Pores CETAPHIL Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 15 delivers nourishing all day hydration that helps to restore and improve your skin's ability to retain vital moisture without clogging pores. This lightweight, non-greasy lotion absorbs quickly and leaves skin feeling immediately smooth, hydrated and nourished. Broad Spectrum Sunscreen Protection This triple action facial moisturizer with SPF 15 protects your skin every day against the sun's harmful rays. Broad spectrum sunscreen protects the skin against the damaging effects of both UVA and UVB rays to help keep skin looking young. Fragrance Free, Gentle Formula Ideal for dry to normal skin, but can be used on all skin types. This gentle, fragrance free face lotion is clinically developed and tested by dermatologists to ensure that it won't cause irritation or clog pores. Designed for use on even the most sensitive skin, it won't aggravate those with dermatitis, rosacea, eczema or acne-prone skin.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL moisturizers deliver long lasting hydration to replenish and protect the skin's moisture barrier from dryness. CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022

Cetaphil Sensitive Skincare Regimen Cleanse skin with a gentle yet effective cleanser morning and night Ideal for dry to normal skin, CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser hydrates as it cleans to remove dirt, makeup and impurities while retaining the skin's natural moisture barrier. Immediately follow with a facial moisturizer to lock in hydration After cleansing, quickly follow with a facial moisturizer while skin is still damp to draw water into the skin and lock it in for long lasting hydration. During the day, it is also recommended to use a facial SPF moisturizer with sun protection. CETAPHIL Daily Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 delivers nourishing hydration that locks in vital moisture and protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Apply a moisturizer at night to help your skin rehydrate, renew and repair Skin cells do their greatest renewal and repair while you sleep at night, yet skin loses more water at night. Using a moisturizer before bed such as CETAPHIL Daily Oil-Free Hydrating Lotion with hyaluronic acid helps boost skin’s moisture reserves and protect skin from dryness throughout the night so that the skin looks and feels refreshed. Complete your dry to normal skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily facial skin care routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your skin type will help to leave your sensitive skin feeling refreshed and hydrated.

Gentle Makeup Removing Wipes Gentle Skin Cleanser Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 15 Rich Hydrating Cream Hydrating Eye Gel Cream Skin Care Benefit Convenient cloths that effortlessly remove waterproof makeup and gently cleanses skin Gentle face wash that cleanses, hydrates and soothes skin Lightweight, oil-free lotion with SPF 15 hydrates while protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays Quick absorbing and non-greasy cream nourishes and rehydrates skin Unique gel-cream quickly absorbs to hydrate, brighten and smooth under eye area Skin Type Sensitive Skin / All Skin Types Dry to Normal Skin Types Sensitive skin / Dry to Normal Skin Sensitive Skin / Dry to Normal Skin Types Sensitive Skin / All Skin Types Key Ingredients Aloe Vera, Chamomile and Green Tea pH balanced, Soap-Free Avobenzone 3%, Octocrylene 10% and Glycerin Hyaluronic Acid, ProVitamin B5, Vitamin E, Vitamin C and Olive extract Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Chamomile extract, Green Tea extract and Licorice Root extract Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't Clog Pores (non-comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product & good vendor
reviews.reviewText: Cetaphil face cream is a rich,creamy moisturizer for dry skin. I like it.The vendor provided timely delivered and all in order. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and also sensitive to fragrance. This product was recommended a long time ago by my dermatologist. The SPF is relatively low, so repeat application(s) during the day may be necessary. The moisturizing quality is quite good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and creamy

reviews.reviewText: This absorbs well into your face. It's not oily, and it gives you protection against the sun.

Muy ligera y se absorbe rápido

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 21, 2018
reviews.reviewText: This product is fantastic. Sadly not made for uk market so bought it from USA. It is marvellous for all skin types especially those needing oil free moisturiser. The pump action bottle means you can easily dispense. Lasts for a long time as it goes a long way coverage wise. I would highly recommend it to anyone with acne prone skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great product if you have sensitive or eczema-prone skin
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product if you have sensitive or eczema-prone skin. I use their face wash and have tried several of their creams. I find the ones in the tubes are heavier than I need on my face since my skin isn't that dry, but this one is perfect. I suddenly developed outbreaks of eczema on my face last year and since changing old products for this, the problem has lessened to the point where I haven't had an outbreak in several months. It is light, absorbs easily and is not greasy. I think it is a great product and would recommend it.
